## r() function

This function is a pure type-cast to avoid TypeScript from complaining when using a Reactive Function Component without [wrap()](./reactive.wrap.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function r(render: () => JSX.Element): JSX.Element;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  render | () =&gt; JSX.Element | The render function of a component |

<b>Returns:</b>

JSX.Element
